Package edupad

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edupad
    Main class for creating GUI and implementing the functionalities of A GUI Text Editor
    Find
    Find class creates a find and replace dialog for Edupad Application
    FontAction
    FontAction class creates a font dialog for setting font for Edupad application
    HelpContentsAction
    HelpContentsAction class creates a dialog for providing manual guide help for Edupad application
    LookAndFeelAction
    LookAndFeelAction class for setting look and feel for Edupad application
    Main
    starter class for Edupad i.e.
    RunAction
    RunAction class creates a run dialog for Edupad Application
    Splash
    Splash class is used here for creating splash screen ie.
    Views
    Views class provides the selected operation for Edupad application so that it can regain the previous look of application
